data.name: CommandInjectionAnalyzer_Message
data.value: The dynamic value passed to the command execution should be validate.

data.name: CommandInjectionAnalyzer_Title
data.value: Potential command injection with Process.Start

data.name: EnableEventValidationFalse_Message
data.value: Event validation is disabled. The integrity of client-side control will not be validate on postback.

data.name: EnableEventValidationFalse_Title
data.value: Event validation is disabled

data.name: EnableViewStateMac_Message
data.value: View state mac is disable. The view state could be altered by an attacker. (This feature cannot be disabled in the recent version of ASP.net)

data.name: EnableViewStateMac_Title
data.value: View state mac is disabled (Future)

data.name: LinqSqlInjectionAnalyzer_Message
data.value: The dynamic value passed in the SQL query should be validate.

data.name: LinqSqlInjectionAnalyzer_Title
data.value: Potential SQL injection with LINQ

data.name: ValidateRequestFalse_Message
data.value: Request validation, which provided additionnal protection against Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), has been disabled.

data.name: ValidateRequestFalse_Title
data.value: Request validation has been disabled (Future)

data.name: ViewStateEncryptionModeFalse_Message
data.value: View state is not encrypted. Controls may leak sensitive data that could be read client-side.

data.name: ViewStateEncryptionModeFalse_Title
data.value: View state is not encrypted (Future)

data.name: WeakCertificateValidationAnalyzer_Message
data.value: Certificate Validation has been disable. The communication could be intercepted.

data.name: WeakCertificateValidationAnalyzer_Title
data.value: Certificate Validation has been disable

data.name: WeakCipherAnalyzer_Message
data.value: DES is not considered strong ciphers for modern applications. Currently, NIST recommends the usage of AES block ciphers instead of DES.

data.name: WeakCipherAnalyzer_Title
data.value: Weak cipher algorithm

data.name: WeakCipherModeAnalyzerCbc_Message
data.value: This specific mode of CBC with PKCS5Padding is susceptible to padding oracle attacks. An adversary could potentially decrypt the message if the system exposed the difference between plaintext with invalid padding or valid padding.

data.name: WeakCipherModeAnalyzerCbc_Title
data.value: CBC mode is weak

data.name: WeakCipherModeAnalyzerEcb_Message
data.value: The ECB mode produce the same result for identical blocks (ie: 16 bytes for AES). An attacker could be able to guess the encrypted message. The use of AES in CBC mode with a HMAC is recommended guaranteeing integrity and confidentiality.

data.name: WeakCipherModeAnalyzerEcb_Title
data.value: ECB mode is weak

data.name: WeakCipherModeAnalyzerGeneric_Message
data.value: The ciphertext produced is susceptible to alteration by an adversary. This mean that the cipher provides no way to detect that the data has been tampered with. If the ciphertext can be controlled by an attacker, it could be altered without detection. The use of AES in CBC mode with a HMAC is recommended guaranteeing integrity and confidentiality.

data.name: WeakCipherModeAnalyzerGeneric_Title
data.value: Weak cipher mode

data.name: WeakHashingAnalyzer_Message
data.value: The hashing function "{0}" is no longer recommended for password storage and signature generation.

data.name: WeakHashingAnalyzer_Title
data.value: Weak hashing function

data.name: WeakRandomAnalyzer_Message
data.value: The random numbers generated could be predicted.

data.name: WeakRandomAnalyzer_Title
data.value: Weak random generator

data.name: XPathInjectionAnalyzer_Message
data.value: The dynamic value passed to the XPath query should be validate

data.name: XPathInjectionAnalyzer_Title
data.value: Potential XPath injection with XmlDocument

data.name: XxeAnalyzer_Message
data.value: The XML parser is configured incorrectly. The operation could be vulnerable to XXE.

data.name: XxeAnalyzer_Title
data.value: XML parsing vulnerable to XXE
